scripts.lint: npm run lint:sol && npm run lint:js
scripts.flatten: truffle-flattener contracts/LBNBImpl.sol > flatten/LBNBImpl.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/SKBImpl.sol > flatten/SKBImpl.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/CommunityTaxVault.sol > flatten/CommunityTaxVault.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/StakeBNBAgent.sol > flatten/StakeBNBAgent.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/StakingRewardVault.sol > flatten/StakingRewardVault.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/UnstakeVault.sol > flatten/UnstakeVault.sol
